name: getutcdate
description: Returns current UTC date and time.

name: sysdatetime
description: Returns date and time of SQL Server.

name: isnull
description: Returns the replacement value if the check_expression is NULL.

name: year
description: Returns an integer that represents the year of the specified date.

name: format
description: Returns a value formatted with the specified format and optional culture in SQL Server.

name: group_concat
description: Concatenates values from multiple rows into a single string, with the values separated by a specified separator.
